title: URF Better be making a return this April..
body:
Every day for allmost a year Iv prayed to the Dark One for its return and the time is NOW!
And this time it goes for 4 weeks and DONT forget to make health costs free as well .(Mundo, Aatrox , Mord ect)
And when April ends you keep URF going at a bare minimum 1 weekend a month!

p.s make it Hexakill URF.

replies.body: This is all I know, i just hope that Urfwick becomes available again.
um urf has been confirmed it may be on aram though :(
